trans-unit.source: Determines the action that occurs when the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.AcceptChanges*> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges*> method is invoked on a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with a <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 決定所發生的動作時<> *> 或<> *> 上叫用方法<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>與<xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Changes to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> are not final until you call the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更<xref:System.Data.DataTable>之前您呼叫不是最終<xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>方法。</xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: When either <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges%2A> is called on a row in the parent table, the AcceptRejectRule value determines whether or not changes are propagated to corresponding rows in the child table.
trans-unit.target: 當 <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges%2A>父資料表，AcceptRejectRule 值會決定是否要將變更傳播到子資料表中對應資料列中的資料列上呼叫。</xref:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes are cascaded across the relationship.

trans-unit.target: （預設值） 會不發生任何動作。
